original_text: Later, Reuben returned to the dry well. He saw that Joseph was not there. He tore his clothes because he was very upset.
korean_text: 르우벤이 돌아와 구덩이에 이르러 본즉 거기 요셉이 없는지라 옷을 찢고

sentences.original_text: Later, Reuben returned to the dry well
He saw that Joseph was not there
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 요셉이 그곳에 없는 것을 보았다
